rumors.text: A star fell into the marsh; anything forged from its metal cuts ghost-stuff.
rumors.notes: Cartel exaggerates the value to bait rivals; actually a broken beacon.

rumors.text: Pilgrims carry a shadow-plague that steals voices at night.
rumors.notes: Sickness is mundane fever; shadows react to tone dial horror scenes.

rumors.text: The forest heartstone can reset any curse if placed beneath the old stones.
Toll collectors now demand ghost coin alongside silver at the eastern bridge.

propagation.downtime: During downtime or scene resolution, propagate one rumor to a new NPC or location and adjust truth clarity.
propagation.mutation: When spread, roll deterministic dice: on low results the wording mutates and truth drifts one step.
propagation.logging: Document spreads in changelog.md with [rumor:spread] and note whether it grew truer or wilder.
